book.synopsis: A new historian of Mary Queen of Scots draws on new sources to shatter various myths surrounding this odd monarch and uncover some of the scandals and political machinations underpinning, and undermining, her throne.
book.title_long: Queen of Scots: The True Life of Mary Stuart
book.dimensions: Height: 9 Inches, Length: 6.25 Inches, Weight: 2.25 Pounds, Width: 2 Inches
